text: The frontside 360 is a progression from the frontside 180.
Make sure you're comfortable with 180s first.
You'll need a bit more speed for this trick.
Wind up your shoulders even more than a 180.
Pop hard off the lip and commit to the rotation.
Keep your head turning to spot the landing.
You'll be blind for a moment, that's normal.
As you come around, spot your landing.
Stomp it and ride away! Practice makes perfect.
